description: Ceding pension data extraction schema based on Data Requirements Specification V1.0. IMPORTANT: Extract values ONLY if explicitly stated. Return 'Not Stated' if missing. Return 'Not Applicable' if not relevant.

provider.description: Name of the pension provider or scheme administrator.

contactNumberAndEmail.description: Contact telephone number and email address for the provider.

planNumber.description: Unique plan or policy number identifier.

planType.description: Type of pension plan (e.g., Group Personal Pension, SIPP, Workplace Pension).

startDate.description: Date when the pension plan started or was established.

retirementDateAge.description: Planned retirement date or age for the pension plan.

currentValueDate.description: Current value of the pension plan and the date of valuation.

transferValueDate.description: Transfer value amount and the date of the transfer value quote.

deathValueIfDiff.description: Death benefit value if different from the transfer value.

fundsInvestedInAndValues.description: Table of funds invested in and their current values.

flexiAccessDrawdown.description: Whether flexi-access drawdown is available on the plan.

ufpls.description: Whether Uncrystallised Funds Pension Lump Sum (UFPLS) is available.

partialUfplsAvailable.description: Whether partial UFPLS withdrawals are available.

transferPenalty.description: Details of any transfer penalties that apply.

transferPenaltyEndDate.description: Date when transfer penalties will end or reduce.

currentRegularsOrDatePaidUp.description: Current regular contribution amount or date when contributions were paid up.

dateOfLastContribution.description: Date of the last contribution made to the plan.

totalContributionsIn.description: Table showing total contributions made into the plan.

percentOfContributionIntoEachFund.description: Table showing percentage allocation of contributions into each fund.

dateRegularsArePaid.description: Date when regular contributions are paid (e.g., monthly, annually).

indexationOnRegulars.description: Details of indexation applied to regular contributions.

annualReviewDayAndMonthIndexation.description: Annual review day and month for indexation increases.

annualRateOfIndexationIncrease.description: Annual rate of indexation increase percentage.

waiverOfContribution.description: Whether waiver of contribution benefit is available.

monthlyCostOfWaiver.description: Monthly cost of the waiver of contribution benefit.

total_regular_contribution.description: Total regular contribution including employer and employee amounts.

date_of_last_contribution.description: Date of the last contribution made.

contribution_history.description: Extract ALL contributions from inception to current date - every contribution made to this policy

transfersInOrLumpSumContributions.description: Details of transfers in or lump sum contributions made.

bulkBlockTransfer.description: Whether transfers were part of a bulk or block transfer arrangement.

aDayValueTfc.description: A-day value and A-day tax-free cash amount for block/bulk transfers.

enhancedTfcCheck.description: Whether enhanced tax-free cash check has been performed.

garGmpGuarantees.description: Details of any Guaranteed Annuity Rate (GAR), Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP), or other guarantees.

lifeCover.description: Details of life cover benefits attached to the pension plan.

numberOfFundsAvailable.description: Total number of funds available for investment.

numberOfFundManagers.description: Number of different fund managers available.

maxFundsAtOneTime.description: Maximum number of funds that can be held at one time.

fundSwitches.description: Details of fund switching options and any restrictions.

origoOptionsCase.description: Whether the plan supports Origo Options for electronic transfers.

withProfits.description: Whether the plan includes with-profits investments.

terminalFinalBonus.description: Details of terminal or final bonus arrangements.

mva.description: Market Value Adjustment (MVA) details and current rate.

mvaFreeDate.description: Date when MVA will no longer apply.

bonusHistoryLast5Years.description: Bonus history for the last 5 years.

guarantees.description: Details of any guarantees (bonus rate, minimum annuity, reversionary bonus, cash sum).

guaranteeCostCharge.description: Cost charge for any guarantees provided.

paidUpProjectionsToSra.description: Projections to State Retirement Age (SRA) if contributions are paid up.

regularsContinuingProjectionsToSra.description: Projections to SRA if regular contributions continue.

isLifestylingApplied.description: Whether lifestyling is applied to the plan.

ifLifestylingOverallGrowthRate.description: Overall growth rate used in projections if lifestyling is applied.

partialTransferPossible.description: Whether partial transfers are possible from the plan.

chargingStructureAlterIfContributionsCea.description: Whether the charging structure would change if contributions cease.

canClientTransferFundButStillContribute.description: Whether client can transfer fund away but continue making contributions.

contributionsHistoryReceived.description: Whether a contributions history has been received.

annualManagementChargeAmc.description: Extract the Annual Management Charge (AMC) or Annual Charge.

platformCharge.description: Extract ONLY if a platform or wrapper charge is EXPLICITLY stated.

adviserCharge.description: Extract ONLY if an adviser charge is EXPLICITLY stated.

policyFee.description: Extract ONLY if a policy fee amount is EXPLICITLY stated.

exitCharge.description: Extract ONLY if an exit charge or early withdrawal penalty is EXPLICITLY stated.

planChargePolicyFee.description: Plan charge or policy fee amount

fundFactsheetsSavedInFile.description: Whether fund factsheets have been saved in the file

initialChargesPaidLast3Years.description: Initial charges paid in the last 3 years

chargeDiscountsRebates.description: Any charge discounts or rebates available

reinvestment_of_charges.description: Details on whether charges are reinvested into the plan.

initial_charges_single.description: Initial charges applied to single contributions.

yearsOfService.description: Total years of service in the scheme

activeOrDeferred.description: Whether membership is active or deferred

normalRetirementAge.description: Normal retirement age for the scheme

is_client_member.description: Whether the client is a member of the scheme

qualifying_workplace_pension.description: Whether this is a qualifying workplace pension scheme

scheme_type_money_purchase.description: Whether the scheme type is money purchase (DC)

auto_enrolment_compliant.description: Whether the scheme is auto-enrolment compliant

max_employer_contributions_used.description: Whether maximum employer contributions are being used

additional_matching_available.description: Whether additional matching contributions are available

salary_sacrifice_available.description: Whether salary sacrifice is available for contributions

employer_NI_saving_passed_to_client.description: Whether employer National Insurance savings are passed to the client

employer_NI_saving_amount.description: Amount of employer National Insurance savings passed to client

date_of_call.description: Date when the call was made

time_of_call.description: Time when the call was made
